name: latex2html5
description: Author interactive math equations and diagrams online using LaTeX and PSTricks
author: Dan Lynch <pyramation@gmail.com>

scripts.build: pnpm run clean && tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && pnpm run copy && pnpm run bundle
scripts.build:dev: pnpm run clean && tsc --declarationMap && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && pnpm run copy && pnpm run bundle
scripts.bundle: browserify dist/index.js --s LaTeX2HTML5 -o dist/latex2html5.bundle.js && cp dist/latex2html5.bundle.js ../../bundle/latex2html5.bundle.js
